index.description: A comma separated list of indices to open

master_timeout.description: Specify timeout for connection to master

deprecated.description: To promote inclusive language, use 'cluster_manager_timeout' instead.

cluster_manager_timeout.description: Specify timeout for connection to cluster-manager node

ignore_unavailable.description: Whether specified concrete indices should be ignored when unavailable (missing or closed)

allow_no_indices.description: Whether to ignore if a wildcard indices expression resolves into no concrete indices. (This includes `_all` string or when no indices have been specified)

expand_wildcards.description: Whether to expand wildcard expression to concrete indices that are open, closed or both.

wait_for_active_shards.description: Sets the number of active shards to wait for before the operation returns.

wait_for_completion.description: If false, the request will return a task immediately and the operation will run in background. Defaults to true.

task_execution_timeout.description: Explicit task execution timeout, only useful when wait_for_completion is false, defaults to 1h.
